name: SMTP for SendGrid – YaySMTP
author: YayCommerce

sections.description:
Send emails from WordPress through SendGrid using SMTP by YayCommerce

SMTP for SendGrid – YaySMTP helps you enhance email deliverability. By replacing WordPress default wp_mail() function, YaySMTP allows your transactional and promotional emails to be sent through with higher reliability.

⚡️ FEATURES

SMTP for SendGrid – YaySMTP comes with an easy-to-use user interface that lets you start sending emails in minutes.

  • Simple setup
  • Clean & quality code
  • Very lightweight
  • SendGrid newsletter & marketing emails
  • Email log

YaySMTP’s Email Log has advanced features that you can only find in other premium plugins. It allows you to automatically delete the email logs that are older than a specified number of days.

🎏 Supported Themes and Plugins

  • Complete compatibility with all themes, page builders and major plugins.
  • Perfect with YayMail – WooCommerce Email Customizer plugin.

📝 Documentation and Support

If you’re having issues, do let us know and we’ll be happy to help.

  • Rate us 5⭐ stars on WordPress.org.
  • Follow us for latest updates!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compliant with GDPR?

Absolutely! YaySMTP doesn’t collect or store any personal information. So rest assured.

Is YaySMTP free?

Yes, you can use it free of charge. YayCommerce WP SMTP plugin for SendGrid comes with all features that you can find in the description above.

How can I further customize my emails?

You can customize WooCommerce email templates by using YayMail free plugin. Fully compatible and optimized for WooCommerce.
